steps.title: Launch application
details: Every scenario begins by opening https://invoify.vercel.app and the landing page loads.

steps.title: Attempt to reach core wizard steps (Bill From / Bill To / Line Items / Tax)
details: ‘Bill From’ header never appears (Test: Bill From section).
‘Bill To’ header never appears (Test: Bill To section).
‘Line Items’ step 3 button not found (Financial calculations – line items).
‘Tax Calculation’ panel not found (Financial calculations – tax).

steps.title: Try to interact with template-related features
details: Main interface header (‘BETA English Toggle theme’) not visible; template list cannot be selected.
Invoice templates section for logo upload cannot be found.

steps.title: Live-preview behaviour
details: Preview panel itself loads (pass) but fails to refresh when form data changes (Real-time updates – step 6 fail).
Wizard–preview sync test cannot click ‘1 . From & To’ button (step fails).

steps.title: Signature workflows
details: Canvas for drawing signature not visible.
Upload area for signature image missing.

steps.title: Basic visual QA issues surfaced by UI review bot
details: Frequent reports of mis-aligned labels/inputs, inconsistent padding & margins, non-uniform buttons, placeholder copy ‘looks off’.

emotional_arc: A real user would start confident when the homepage appears, but quickly become confused when expected headers or sections never render. Repeated attempts to interact (clicking template buttons, signature areas, wizard steps) fail silently, leading to frustration and doubt about site stability. Visual inconsistencies (spacing, mis-aligned fields) add a feeling of sloppiness, eroding trust. By the time they try advanced tasks (logo, tax, signatures) they would likely abandon the process.

qualitative_opportunities.area: Critical elements not rendered / missing DOM nodes
qualitative_opportunities.why_it_matters: When key wizard sections (Bill From, Bill To, Line Items, Tax, Signature canvases) fail to appear, users are blocked and assume the product is broken.
next_actions: Audit component mounting logic – verify conditional rendering and route/state dependencies.
Add end-to-end smoke test that asserts presence of each step header after load.
Display friendly error state if component fails instead of nothing.

qualitative_opportunities.area: Live preview does not update reliably
qualitative_opportunities.why_it_matters: Real-time feedback is a headline feature; if changes aren’t mirrored promptly, users lose trust and may think data hasn’t saved.
next_actions: Debounce / throttle input handlers but ensure state propagation to preview.
Add visual ‘syncing’ indicator or last-updated timestamp.
Unit-test preview store with field change events.

qualitative_opportunities.area: Inconsistent spacing, alignment, and button styling
qualitative_opportunities.why_it_matters: Visual noise lowers perceived quality and accessibility, especially in a form-heavy tool.
next_actions: Establish design tokens for spacing & typography and apply globally.
Add CSS linting & visual regression tests.
Run quick style pass on form label/field alignment.

qualitative_opportunities.why_it_matters: Placeholders like ‘BETA English’ or non-informative examples leave users unsure how to proceed and look unpolished.
next_actions: Replace placeholders with instructive examples (e.g., ‘Acme Corp, 123 Main St’).
Create content style-guide for headings & placeholders.
Implement i18n fallback so missing strings surface clearly during QA.

qualitative_opportunities.why_it_matters: Signatures and branding are required for a usable invoice; if users cannot locate these, they cannot complete their task.
next_actions: Ensure signature canvas/upload widgets are visible behind feature flags or in correct wizard step.
Add prominent ‘Add signature/logo’ buttons with iconography.
Provide sample signature to illustrate expected outcome.

qualitative_opportunities.why_it_matters: Switching templates is a high-impact action; no visual confirmation leaves users guessing.
next_actions: Display loading skeleton or highlight selected template.
Ensure preview re-renders after template ID change and write integration test.
Standardise button sizes & card selection states.

first_tackles.description: Guarantee initial wizard sections (Bill From & Bill To) mount on first load – blocking defect causing multiple test failures.
Fix live-preview state binding so any field change instantly updates preview; add smoke test.
Apply global CSS spacing & alignment rules to remove most ‘looks off’ visual issues (quick design token pass).
Expose signature canvas/upload & typed signature inputs behind a clear ‘Add Signature’ CTA.
Swap placeholder / beta copy for real instructional text, especially in form placeholders.
